content: SAN FRANCISCO Skechers USA's stock  was on track for its best day in over two years on Thursday after the shoe seller's chief executive bought $11 million worth of the beleaguered shares and a brokerage recommended it after viewing new products at a trade show.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: Wall Street steps into Skechers after CEO buys shares

content: Adidas AG   on Monday escalated its legal battle against Skechers USA Inc  over athletic sneaker designs  filing a lawsuit accusing Skechers of stealing its "Springblade" concept for its similar "Mega Flex" shoe.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: Adidas sues Skechers  claiming 'Springblade' shoe knockoff

content: Sports footwear maker and retailer Skechers USA Inc's  revenue missed analysts' estimates as a strong dollar reduced the value of international sales  sending its shares down 35 percent after market on Thursday.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: Skechers revenue misses estimates  shares plummet 35 percent

content: Oct 22 Sports footwear maker and retailer Skechers USA Inc's revenue missed analysts' estimates as a strong dollar reduced the value of international sales  sending its shares down 35 percent after market on Thursday.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Skechers revenue misses estimates  shares plummet 35 pct

content: Oct 22 Sports footwear retailer Skechers USA Inc  reported lower-than-expected rise in quarterly comparable sales and revenue  sending its shares down 35 percent after market.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: Skechers revenue misses estimates  stock plummets

content: Sports shoe maker and retailer Skechers USA Inc  reported a better-than-expected 36 percent rise in quarterly revenue  helped by pent-up demand following the end of labor disruptions at U.S. West Coast ports that had held up imports  as well as increased shipments of back-to-school items.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: Skechers sales and earnings beat estimates  shares jump

content: July 29 Sports shoe maker and retailer Skechers USA Inc reported a better-than-expected 36 percent rise in quarterly revenue  helped by pent-up demand following the end of labor disruptions at U.S. West Coast ports that had held up imports  as well as increased shipments of back-to-school items.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: REFILE-UPDATE 1-Skechers sales and earnings beat estimates  shares jump

title: US STOCKS-Wall St recovers as data points to growing economy

content: July 29 Sports shoe maker Skechers USA Inc  reported a 36 percent rise in quarterly revenue  helped by pent-up demand after the U.S. West Coast port strike and increased shipments of back-to-school items in the United States and international markets.
name: Skechers USA Inc
title: Skechers quarterly revenue jumps 36 pct  shares soar
